name: inContactTest
description: Extracts InContact metrics from Windows Performance Counters

paramSchema.title: Counter
paramSchema.name: counter
paramSchema.description: The full windows performance counter path

paramSchema.title: Multiplier
paramSchema.name: multiplier
paramSchema.description: An integer value to multiply the counter value by. Default: 1

paramSchema.title: Metric
paramSchema.name: metric
paramSchema.description: The ID of the metric in Pulse that will contain data for this perf counter. You must manually create a metric before entering this definition here.
